```{r}
library(nlme)
library(lme4)
```

```{r}
# LME: random intercept for each county
colnames(data)[73:84] = c("test1","test2","test3","test4","SD1","SD2","SD3","SD4","M1","M2","M3","M4")
simple_lme = lme(log(daily_r)~log(winter_tmmx)+log(winter_rmax)+log(susceptible_perc)+log(density)+log(withHS)
                   +log(Poverty_percentage)+log(AfriAm_perc)+log(older_perc)
                   +test1+test2+test3+test4+SD1+SD2+SD3+SD4+M1+M2+M3+M4
                   ,data=data,random = list(FIPS=~1),na.action = na.omit)
summary(simple_lme)

```
